description:
A versatile waterproof jacket for backcountry freeride.

This protective jacket (840g M/L 720g W/M) is made for freeriding, but works perfectly for all kinds of ski/snowboard activities.

The jacket is made in a premium GORE-TEX® fabric. We use it because it’s the world-leading quality for durable waterproofness (28,000mm), optimized breathability (RET Less than 9), and total windproofness.

The main fabric is a 2L ePE PFC free Gore-Tex® (100 g/m2) with a 70D 100% recycled nylon face. The reinforcement on shoulders and the elbows is a 150D 100% recycled ePE PFC free polyester fabric (180g/m2).

Key features include: A helmet-compatible Storm hood with a one-hand adjustment, a chest pocket, two zippered lower hand pockets, a key card sleeve pocket, underarm ventilation, one zippered inner pocket, a smooth fleece chin protector, a one-hand hem adjustment, a snow skirt and laminated woven hand gaiters.

This jacket has a regular fit.
name: Norrona Tamok GTX Jacket - Mens
